channel.title: How to change xp rates?
channel.description:
Can somebody tell me / give me code, on changing xp rates.
I want like 200 xp per hit (if thats slow-ish training)

item.title: How to change xp rates?
item.dc:creator: @Vendetta1234 Vendetta1234
item.description:
@Vendetta1234 wrote:

Only thing which shows up is:

public void doFires(int multXP, int req, int logID) {
	if (playerLevel[11] >= req) {
				setAnimation(733);
				sendMessage("You attempt to light the logs...");
				sendMessage("...the fire catches and the logs begin to burn!");
				fireTimer[curFires] = (misc.random(210)+30); // fires last between 15sec and 2 mins
				ReplaceObject2(absX, absY, 2732, 0, 10); // creates the fire
				fireX[curFires] = absX; // sets x and y to current x and y so the fire can be deleted
				fireY[curFires] = absY; // " "
				addSkillXP(multXP*playerLevel[11], 11);
				deleteItem(logID, getItemSlot(logID), 1);
				curFires++;
	}else{
		sendMessage("You need "+req+" firemaking to burn "+GetItemName(logID)+" logs."); // if they dont have required level
	}
}

In client.java - if thats correct file.

ANOTHER SOLUTION PLS.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change xp rates?
item.dc:creator: @try_again try again
item.description:
@try_again wrote:

Simple way is to see how much exp you get at the moment in a certain stat then search

 exp*

replace exp with the amount it gives but keep the *
